title: Measurement Set
description: Measurement set is a file set that hosts raw data files (e.g. FASTQs) resulting from sequencing of a library prepared from the nucleic acids of the sample that is the main target of the assay. For example sequencing of accessible regions in the genome, or sequencing of the transcriptome of the sample. The assay can either be bulk or single cell type. The sample specific raw sequencing results will be captured in the measurement sets. The files in the measurement sets are specific to the sample being investigated. See auxiliary sets for files that are not a direct result of sequencing the sample under investigation.

onlist_files.comment: Specification of barcode onlist files requires a barcode onlist method.

onlist_method.comment: Specification of an onlist method requires barcode onlist files.

assay_term.title: Assay Term
assay_term.description: The assay used to produce data in this measurement set.

protocols.title: Protocols
protocols.description: Links to the protocol(s) for conducting the assay on Protocols.io.

preferred_assay_title.title: Preferred Assay Title
preferred_assay_title.description: The custom lab preferred label for the experiment performed in this measurement set.

multiome_size.title: Multiome Size
multiome_size.description: The number of datasets included in the multiome experiment this measurement set is a part of.

control_type.title: Control Type
control_type.description: The type of control this file set represents.

enum_descriptions.control transduction: The samples have been transduced with a construct that serves as a control.
enum_descriptions.low FACS signal: The samples have minimal fluorescence in Flow Cytometry (FACS), used as a baseline or negative control.
enum_descriptions.pre-selection: The samples were collected before any selection or sorting process, representing the starting population.
enum_descriptions.unsorted FACS input: The samples analyzed by Flow Cytometry (FACS) without any sorting, representing the full, unsorted population.
enum_descriptions.untransfected: The samples have not undergone transfection, used as a baseline or negative control.

sequencing_library_types.title: Sequencing Library Types
sequencing_library_types.description: Description of the libraries sequenced in this measurement set.

enum_descriptions.direct RNA: Sequencing library made from total RNA, capturing both coding and non-coding RNA.
enum_descriptions.exome capture: Sequencing library focusing on the coding regions of the genome by capturing and sequencing exonic regions.
enum_descriptions.mRNA enriched: Sequencing library prepared from RNA samples enriched for mRNA.
enum_descriptions.rRNA depleted: Sequencing library made from RNA samples with ribosomal RNA (rRNA) removed.
enum_descriptions.polyA depleted: Sequencing library prepared from RNA samples with poly(A) tails removed.
enum_descriptions.polyA enriched: Sequencing library made from RNA samples with poly(A) tails selectively enriched.

auxiliary_sets.title: Auxiliary Sets
auxiliary_sets.description: The auxiliary sets of files produced alongside raw data from this measurement set.

items.title: Auxiliary Set
items.description: An auxiliary set of files produced alongside raw data from this measurement set.
items.comment: See auxiliary_set.json for a list of available identifiers.

file_set_type.description: The category that best describes this measurement set.
file_set_type.comment: File set type describes the content of the measurement set.

enum_descriptions.experimental data: Experimental data refers to any data obtained in a genomics assay.

external_image_url.title: External Image URL
external_image_url.description: Links to the external site where images produced by this measurement are stored.

targeted_genes.title: Targeted Genes
targeted_genes.description: A list of genes targeted in this assay. For example, TF ChIP-seq attempts to identify binding sites of a protein encoded by a specific gene. In CRISPR FlowFISH, the modified samples are sorted based on expression of a specific gene. This property differs from small_scale_gene_list in Construct Library Set, which describes genes targeted by the content integrated in the constructs (such as guide RNAs.)

items.title: Gene
items.comment: See gene.json for a list of available identifiers.

functional_assay_mechanisms.title: Functional Assay Mechanisms
functional_assay_mechanisms.description: The biological processes measured by this functional assay. For example, a VAMP-seq (MultiSTEP) assay measures the effects of variants on protein carboxylation and secretion processes.

onlist_method.title: Onlist Method
onlist_method.description: The method by which the onlist files will be combined by the seqspec onlist tool to generate the final barcode inclusion list for the single cell uniform pipeline.

enum_descriptions.no combination: The seqspec yaml files only have one barcode region and no onlist combination needed.
enum_descriptions.product: The seqspec onlist tool will generate a Cartesian product of barcodes included in all barcode regions' onlist files.
enum_descriptions.multi: The seqspec onlist tool will generate a Multi product of barcodes included in all barcode regions' onlist files.

onlist_files.title: Onlist Files
onlist_files.description: The barcode region onlist files listed in associated seqspec yaml files.
